channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Dell Storage Resource Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Dell Storage Resource Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-0157|2024-04-12T16:59:51.179Z -- Dell -- Dell Storage Resource Manager
item.description: Dell Storage Resource Manager, 4.9.0.0 and below, contain(s) a Session Fixation Vulnerability in SRM Windows Host Agent. An adjacent network unauthenticated attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to the hijack of a targeted user's application session.
